title: Cyrus Allows the Jews to Return
summary: King Cyrus of Persia fulfills Godâ€™s prophecy by issuing a decree that the Jews can return to Jerusalem and rebuild the temple. He returns the temple articles that Nebuchadnezzar had taken, and the people prepare to go.

faq.question: Why did Cyrus let the Jews return?
faq.answer: God moved his heart to fulfill prophecy and rebuild the temple in Jerusalem.

faq.question: What did Cyrus give back to the Jews?
faq.answer: The temple treasures that were taken by Nebuchadnezzar.
